org.polarsys.chess.codegen.ada.service

Class UML2Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.polarsys.chess.codegen.ada.service.UML2Service

  • public class UML2Service
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class UML2Service contains utility methods that are meant to be called from the Acceleo Transformation

        instList - the list of instances
        stName - the stereotype name. Must be "MARTE::MARTE_DesignModel::GCM::ClientServerPort"
        Returns:
        the list of slots that require an interface

        op1 - the first operation

        Returns:

      • isFunction

        public java.lang.Boolean isFunction(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Operation op)
        checks if the operation generates a function in Ada. it's a function if there's one and only one parameter with direction "return"
        Parameters:
        op - the operation
        Returns:
        true if it's a function, false otherwise (it is a procedure)
